title: Supplements
author: Admin

cleaned_text: Know Your Supplements At NHC, we believe it is important to only carry the finest quality supplements. We want you to know we do research on all brands before we bring them into the store. We research where the products are made and how they are manufactured. We want to take the guesswork out of the equation so that you will feel comfortable with what you purchase at NHC. Our two large supplement aisles provide thousands of products including vitamins, herbs, homeopathic remedies, protein powders and much, much more. We work hard to provide our customers with brands they can trust. We carry all the popular lines- Garden of Life, Europharma, Jarrow, Blue Bonnet, Solaray, Solgar, Country Life, Kal and more. Did you know the NHC has two exclusive vitamin lines, Natural Health Center and Mike's Choice. We take pride in featuring products that contain the most trusted ingredients in the world. Our products are highly innovative and scientifically formulated. They are also made under GMPs(Good Manufacturing Practices) and are independently lab tested. We believe our two house brands have few rivals in the marketplace. We also are dedicated to ongoing education and training for our staff. We know walking the supplement aisles can be overwhelming. Come visit us and let our experience help you find what you are looking for.
